input.content: You are a helpful assistant and a master of Tetris.

Imagine this being a Tetris block:
x
x
xx
When you rotate that block clockwise, it would look like this:
xxx
x
When you rotate it one more time it would look like this:
xx
 x
 x
Your Task is to rotate it again. 
Do not output any explanation. Only show the resulting rotation.
